title: Sugarfoots
subtitle: Sugarfoots anchor product is a renowned child-safe, hand-crafted multi-ethnic rag doll, complemented by a children’s book series based on folktales from cultures around the world. Our mission is sustained by a performing arts summer camp for youth that sets the pace among competitors, inspiriting the imagination through creative storytelling, song and dance.

title: As I Am
subtitle: As I Am hair is a natural hair care brand. It markets unique and exclusively formulated hair products. It consists of 11 products designed for tightly coiled hair made from the finest organic ingredients. The line then became a quick success.

title: AuxGod
subtitle: AUXGOD is a music battle card game that Rousseau created six months after quitting his job. Players dance, sing, and argue over yesterday’s classics and today’s hits. You’ll never have a wack party again!

title: Cuff
subtitle: A platform for creating mature conversations through discussions of love and dating experiences.

title: Natural Cuties
subtitle: Natural Cuties is a brand that promotes, encourages and highlights the beauty of African American hair in its natural state! #Iamanaturalcutie are you?

title: Princess Omalie
subtitle: Welcome To The Wonderful World Of Princess Omalie Unlock the magic and lore of The kingdom of IgboOrai, Africa’s oldest Monarchy and greatest dynasty of kings and queens! We’ve been waiting for you!

title: Princess Planet
subtitle: Princess Planet is a brand of children's entertainment that helps promote characters with diverse hair textures, skin tones, and cultural backgrounds.

title: Bailee's Nail Box
subtitle: Bailee's Nail Box is a FUN box for girls, created by 11 year old Bailee K. for girls ages 4 - 12 who love all things nails! Bailee's goal was to create memorable boxes filled with different tools for fun nail designs with an extra girly accessory with each box.

title: Bedroom Kandi
subtitle: Welcome to Bedroom Kandi, where women, men, and their partners can pamper themselves with intimate luxury! At Bedroom Kandi, our mission is to destigmatize intimacy and self-love, promote sexual wellness and education, and empower entrepreneurs to find success and happiness in the business of pleasure.

title: Blvck Spades
subtitle: Blvck Spades playing cards is a customized deck designed for playing JJDD spades. Its creators made it in a way that makes it easier for individuals to learn to play.

title: Puzzle Huddle
subtitle: Kids grow up fast! Stay connected and hear about new puzzle designs and discounts. We promise not to spam you because we're too busy with potty training and coloring books.

title: StepStitches
subtitle: Welcome to StepStitches where you can find unique keepsakes sure to delight. Each item is handmade with love and exquisite care. Both ready to ship and custom made items are available.

title: Sweet Pea Books Inc
subtitle: Sweet Pea Books is dedicated to producing multicultural books that expose, inspire, amuse, and foster a love of reading in all children. Sweet Pea Books aims to promote the development of good character by teaching values through literature as well as expose young readers to different cultures.

title: Shy Chy Books
subtitle: Shy Chy Books will offer a series of books all about encouraging children to be themselves and embracing their individuality. The first book, I can't, I can't... I CAN! is about a girl who desires to make friends and participate in different activities, but she is held back by her shyness.

title: Camryn's Creations
subtitle: Camryn Green is a 12 year old artist with a passion for painting. Camryn wants to share her gift with the world, will giving back, in the process. She loves to sketch and paint and her prize possession is her canvases!

title: Coily and Cute
subtitle: Sharee has loved art all her life and has taken every opportunity to study it. She runs one of the Black-owned companies where customers can buy art prints.

title: Darlyng & Co.
subtitle: The mission of Darlyng & Co. is to give parents one less thing to worry about when it comes to caring for their baby. We always have parents in mind in the design process and are proud to present products that are functional, toxin-free, sourced from high-quality materials, and aesthetically pleasing.

title: Double Dutch Dolls
subtitle: Through Fashion and Fun encourage young girls to explore and appreciate each other’s differences and similarities. Beauty comes in all shades and the brand seeks to create a community that celebrates the multicultural beauty of every child.

title: Figgers Communication Inc.
subtitle: Figgers Communication is where the entire buzz on the internet and social media comes to rest in your pocket! We are a telecommunications company that provides Cellular, Mobile Broadband, Home phone and international calling services.

title: Koils by Nature
subtitle: It's the mission of Koils by Nature to provide beauty products, with highest quality plant-based ingredients, excellent customer service, and an educating, empowering, engaging our online community.

title: Puku
subtitle: Puku was founded in the aftermath of Hurricane Sandy after experiencing the hardship of living without the power to charge phones. And just like the animal, it retains the same essential qualities such as Power, Beauty and Speed.

title: Raycon
subtitle: Raycon is built around the mission that everyone deserves to enjoy great audio. We believe amazing audio experiences inspire go-getters around the world and power their everyday lives.

title: Sorella
subtitle: Sorella was founded by two Boss Babes, Heather Sanders & Brittney Turner in 2012. We were 20 years old with no fashion background or training but a lot of hustle and drive! Starting with an inventory of 10 products and packing packages on the floor of our apartment, we never imagined how far we would get!

title: EverHaven
subtitle: I created EverHaven LLC because I wanted to offer my customers apparel and accessories that would allow them to "live out loud." I absolutely love EVERYTHING about myself, and I want other people to feel just as proud of themselves. I hope to provide customers with a sense of pride in who they are.

title: RayTec Audio
subtitle: RayTec, wherever you go, your soundtrack should follow. Music has changed the world. It's a form of expression and should be heard at the highest, premium level. When you hear music that you like, when you're listening to a book of your choosing, you get excited, or motivated or you may become active.

title: The Afro Gypsy
subtitle: I create jewelry and accessories that enhance the uniqueness of you; we like to call it Bohemian with an AFRO-tude! My work predominantly consist of leather and metalwork items. But, considering my love for the extraordinary, you may stumble upon many other new or vintage items that could steal your heart!

title: Grace & Styles Boutique
subtitle: Grace & Styles Boutique is a provider of quality leather handbags and must-have accessories.  We provide a variety of colors and trendy styles at affordable prices to suite everyone!

title: I wear African
subtitle: I Wear African is a campaign initiative created to promote and celebrate the contemporary African lifestyle by bringing the best quality Afrocentric brands to our fans.

title: Fewer Cards
subtitle: Fewer Cards is a touchless smart card that allows you to express yourself and share who you are with others by exchanging contact information, social media, and data seamlessly. The concept of Fewer Cards started from the fact that exchanging paper business cards is wasteful and cumbersome.

title: The Litty Lighters
subtitle: Check out these cool Litty products. Each product aside from our accessories has either and LED touch or LED light. We strive to have eco-friendly, rechargeable, and safe, products for our customers.

title: D'Lashes
subtitle: Take your eyelashes from thin unnoticeable eyelashes to rich, full, beautiful ones. Dionne’s Lashes are custom individual eyelash extensions that are attached to your natural eyelashes, lasting up to 6-8 weeks.

title: Ujamaa Lighting
subtitle: Although light bulbs are considered a commodity, the Ujamaa Lighting brand aspires to bring its own unique take on the lighting industry. Founded in June 2019, Ujamaa Lighting, specializes residential, commercial, and industrial LED lighting solutions.

title: NSPRE Electronics
subtitle: The NSPRE™ brand is built on and strives for creativity and culture. We create exciting, lifestyle, and innovative products that inspire everyday use. Our vision is to "Inspire the culture through social technology" to improve others' lifestyles and the way we access the world around us.

title: HOUSE OF MARLEY
subtitle: The House of Marley is built on the principles of superior quality, sustainability and a commitment to charitable causes. We are driven to enhance lives through great product experiences as well as using proceeds from product sales to support global reforestation through Project Marley.

title: Mike D's BBQ
subtitle: Mike D's BBQ is an award winning line of signature BBQ sauces and all-purpose dry rubs. Our sauces are a twist on the traditional BBQ sauce with some unique seasonings and spice levels.

title: Camella's Kitchen
subtitle: Camella’s Kitchen is helping you to elevate your meals at home and on the go with our bold Caribbean flavors – we ship. We started Camella's Kitchen in order to honor the memory of and carry on lessons learned from Ms. Camella, our mother and grandmother respectively.

title: Oh-Mazing!
subtitle: Yes, we sell granola (it's quite tasty), but more importantly, we want to inspire you to live your life with purpose, passion, and to follow your dreams. Our products are here to bring the adventure back to snacking, and better yet, celebrate YOU when those dreams are achieved.

title: Shoe Crazy Wine
subtitle: We work with the best vineyards in California to develop our unique blends. Our wines are created with women in mind. Owned and operated by a mother-daughter team, we understand that women face tough daily challenges. And we know we can tackle them together-with a great pair of shoes and a great wine!

title: The Honey Wine Company
subtitle: Inspired by his country's national beverage t'ej (honey wine), Ayele realized that these flowering trees were an ideal source of nectar and pollen that bees use to make valuable honey.  This set Ayele on a quest to better understand the art and business of creating honey wine.

title: Naja Tea
subtitle: At Naja Tea, we stand for quality, integrity, and curiosity. We strive daily to maintain high standards in every aspect of our business. Our mission is to provide a positive, significant, and sensational experience with Naja Tea.

title: 57 Chocolate
subtitle: 57 is the pioneer bean to bar chocolate business in Ghana. ’57 Chocolate is short for 1957, which is the year of Ghana’s independence. This venture uses resources grown within the country to create delicious treats.

title: Good Thoughts Tea Co
subtitle: We are an all natural loose leaf tea company that is centered around the healing properties of herbs. Our main goal is to help heal from the inside out all while reawakening the conversation and experience of tea. Started in 2014 by Ebone’ McCloud, we are located in and operate from Chicago.

title: Ka'oir Fitness
subtitle: Ka'oir Fitness, founded in 2011 by celebrity Keyshia Ka'oir is a fitness line of patented, trademarked fat burners to help people lose weight faster than ever.

title: Ka'oir Fitness
subtitle: Ka'oir Fitness, founded in 2011 by celebrity Keyshia Ka'oir is a fitness line of patented, trademarked fat burners to help people lose weight faster than ever.

title: MoreFire! Hot Sauce
subtitle: MoreFire! Hot Sauce is a concoction of spicy fiery goodness. For those who are serious about good quality food. We are 1st place nationwide award winning... so get on the winning Team. You need MoreFire! in your life!

title: Abbey Creek Winery
subtitle: Abbey Creek is the first black owned winery and vineyard in Oregons recorded history. We play hip hop in the tasting room and have a unconventional approach to the wine experience. Come see what "The Crick Life" is all about at abbeycreekvineyard.com

title: AIRIS FOODS
subtitle: AIRIS FOODS are hand crafted food products that add flavor and flare to all your cooking and snacking needs. With both the home cook and the commercial chef in mind, owner Airis the Chef combines simple, wholesome ingredients to create BIG FLAVOR profiles.

title: Askanya
subtitle: Les Chocolateries Askanya is Haiti’s first and only premier bean-to-bar chocolate company. We exclusively use Haitian cacao to produce our chocolates in our facility located in Ouanaminthe, Haiti.

title: Bamenda Coffee
subtitle: Want to have the best coffee beans in Chicago, Illinois? Get them here at Bamenda Coffee, where our coffee comes fresh from the highlands of Bamenda, Africa, and Latin America. We bring you 100% Arabica and Robusta coffee that will surely make you ask for more.

title: Mystic Momma
subtitle: Specializing in teas, tinctures, yoni steams, sitz baths, blends for hormone balance, reproductive health and womb wellness.

title: Nikki Crisps
subtitle: Delicious Plantain Crisps | Vegan and Gluten Free with No Preservatives. Proudly Made in Ghana.

title: Savor Seasoning Blends
subtitle: Savor Seasonings blends are handcrafted creations by the Spencer family; Dulani, Lisa and Myles.

title: Doe Wiz Apparel
subtitle: Doe Wiz apparel was found by Kamar Doe Wiz Lewis. The term Doe came about from the street meaning "Money," and the term "Wiz" short for wisdom. By combining the two terms, we have the name "Doe Wiz" which means "A smart way to get money."

title: Fishing Caddy
subtitle: Our company is dedicated to bringing you the absolute best system for fishing and overall enjoyment of the sport.

title: Jarvis Boards
subtitle: Jarvis Boards' mission has always been to craft paddle boards in Austin, Texas that are environmentally friendly, look great, and perform well. To accomplish this, we employ a wide range of techniques to craft our small-batch production wooden SUPs in our Austin studio.

title: Lyfestyle Clothing
subtitle: It’s our goal to produce quality clothing that embodies our inspirations of the moment. We only source premium fabrics, usually directly from NYC's garment district. All of our cut and sewn garments are made at our Brooklyn factory. We strive to build a strong brand by consistently making quality clothing that our customers can be proud to wear.

title: Dynamic Confluence
subtitle: I have items that I carry with me anywhere I go in case of an emergency. I couldn't find an emergency kit that was complete, so I made a few of my own. I hope people will find these items useful. It's better to have and not need, than need and not have.

title: Hoodietowel
subtitle: Super soft, absorbent microfiber towel. Sized just right for optimal flexibility 100% cotton. Machine wash. Imported

title: POWERHANDZ

moreInfo: POWERHANDZ is a global company that manufactures unique skill development products used by thousands of professional and youth athletes in multiple sports.

title: NinetyNine Products
subtitle: Our mission is to deliver functional & beautiful product that celebrate the people who help people. 99% of our marketing dollars will spotlight those individuals we believe do more than their fare share of shaping our communities in positive ways.

title: The Better Results
subtitle: The Better Results Push bar was created to solve a Problem, the equipment has been patented and now the hopes in every one can benefit from the invention.

title: Scent Affairs
subtitle: Our goal is to continuously strive to make and provide a quality product. The goal, create a safe, effective, quality product with a long lasting scentual affect.

title: Perfect Blue Alchemy
subtitle: Perfect Blue Alchemy is handcrafted organic, vegan and natural perfumes, body products and home items made from organic essential oils and organic plant oils.

title: Beija Flor Naturals
subtitle: Beija-Flor Naturals has nearly a decade as a Curly Girl favorite product line in addition to skincare that is effective, exotic and unique in the green beauty market.

title: Black Beard Brigade Men's Grooming Co.
subtitle: We carry grooming products that are primarily geared towards the bearded community, but we also have women and children using them as well. Our oil, balm, and butter are excellent for the hair on your head, and the butter can also double as a lotion.

title: CarmaBella Skincare
subtitle: CarmaBella Skincare is made for women who want the best skincare, without any artificial chemicals or unnecessary ingredients. When using our products, you don't have to choose between natural and luxurious.

title: Elements of Aliel
subtitle: Elements of Aliel is a collection of products that are gentle, yet effective and made with nature and love. We focus on ingredient quality to bring you plant powered goodness that rivals anything you an find on the market today.

title: Harrison Blake Apparel
subtitle: Harrison Blake Apparel has found a way to deliver high quality men's accessories at a great price. The style and variety of products are sure to please any gentleman.

title: Lizzie's All Natural Products
subtitle: Here at Lizzie's All-natural Products, we create fresh, natural, toxin free products for your home and body. Our promise is to provide you with quality products that your skin will love and benefit from.

title: Marie Hunter Beauty
subtitle: Cosmetics and Fragrances for the Modern Muse. Boldly empowering women with beauty, confidence and class since 2016.

title: My Beautiful Fluff
subtitle: Clothes designed with curves in mind. Each shirt is cut to accommodate curves and fluff with custom to cut to my size chart with sizes L to 5XL.

title: BLACK ON BLACK
subtitle: Black On Black™ is beautifully designed clothing & accessories that are both clothing line AND protest sign. Black On Black™ is a social protest on clothing that De:Constructs the Construct.

title: CurlyCoilyTresses
subtitle: At CurlyCoilyTresses, we create products that help soothe scalps and moisturize and hydrate hair. We've helped thousands just like you to lengthen and strengthen their hair; soften, moisturize and hydrate their hair; and improve the overall appearance of their hair.

title: Loza Tam
subtitle: Shop our collection of women's African Head Wraps. All of our head wraps & turbans are lined in satin to protect the hair against frizz, breakage and moisture loss.

title: Omalicha Naturals
subtitle: Omalicha translates to beautiful in our native language of Igbo. We handcraft all natural, clean beauty products for the hair and skin designed to bring ones natural beauty to the forefront.

title: AcARRE
subtitle: AcARRE™ is a natural prestige brand of multi-use bioactive beauty products for the beauty minimalist to age beautifully, based on modernized African and Pacific Islander ancestry elements delivering multi-level benefits, bringing balance to the skin.

title: KAZMALEJE
subtitle: At KAZMALEJE (pronounced cosmology), we are dedicated to creating innovative, lifestyle-amplifying tools and accessories to improve our customers' hair care and beauty regimens.

title: Yelani
subtitle: Yelani products are specifically designed and created for women with naturally curly hair. The product line features chemical free hair care products made from 100% natural ingredients.

title: Diva By Cindy
subtitle: Diva is for a woman who wants : Beauty, Excellence and Elegance in her hair. "DIVA" stands for: Divine, Inspired, Virtuous and Annointed. Thank you for using Diva by Cindy... the secret to Longer, Healthier Hair.

title: Krem au Krem, LLC
subtitle: Krem au Krem specialize in body butters, hair & body oils, lip balms, sugar scrubs, pomades, beard care, and much more! These products are 100% vegan, natural, plant-based, chemical/toxin free, cruelty free, & made with passion!

title: 26 King Wavy Merch, LLC
subtitle: All of our quality brushes are great brushes! They aren't just great for 360 waves. They, too, promote healthy hair in men, women and children, as well as healthy beards.

title: Southern Elegance Candle Co.
subtitle: At Southern Elegance Candle Co., to be southern isn’t solely about where you’re from. Our collections are sure to please and will whisk you away to a special place of joy, love, and tranquility.

title: Amazing Essence
subtitle: Amazing Essence is a Philadelphia based, one-woman small business built on a dream of entrepreneurship. Our handcrafted products are created using 100% soy wax without additives, natural (lead-free) cotton wick and high quality fragrance oils without phthalates or additives.

title: Kultured Misfits
subtitle: Kultured Misfits is a lifestyle, sport and ready-to-wear brand based out of Atlanta, Georgia. With a heavy influence from culture found in music, film, and art, we are driven to create timeless work by portraying an aesthetic that is uniquely our own to impact our everyday life.

title: Smell Good Spa
subtitle: Established in 1998, we are purveyors of aromatic products for women who are making a conscientious change in their personal care products. Our products are the cherry-on-top for women who love to live good, feel good and smell good, wholesomely.

title: Spoon & Theory Handmade
subtitle: Spoon and Theory handmade is a black-owned creative arts, jewelry and aromatherapy goods store. We provide goods from upcycled leather to Eco-inspired laser cut jewelry + aromatherapy diffuser jewelry + aromatherapy body + home goods.

title: The Green Laundress
subtitle: The Green Laundress offers the best laundry products at the lowest prices online.

title: QuintesScential Candles
subtitle: Since we love burning scented candles, we decided to embark on our journey of becoming Black chandlers. We decided, from the beginning, to use only the healthiest ingredients in anything that we make and sell.

title: Soul Impactful
subtitle: Soul Impactful strongly believes in the divine power of the universe and we also believe that every being has access to this Source. Our purpose is to provide you with tools to aid you in your spiritual journey and cheer on your glo' up!

title: Kintu New York
subtitle: Kintu handbags are designed in New York, co-developed with global artisans, and made in Italy. The Kintu brand appeals to the dynamic, busy, urban woman who values quality and self-expression.

title: Namascents Candle Co
subtitle: Namascents Candle Co crafts candles and home fragrance products for any space; welcoming peace, stillness and good thoughts. Our inspiration is nature, love + memories. We keep it clean + simple with a scentful twist.

title: Shades of My Melanin LLC
subtitle: At Shades of My Melanin, our goal is to not only offer products that make you feel beautiful in your own skin but to offer products that tell a story for each and every person who wears them. We offer fun, colorful, and creative products that can be worn by all ages.

title: Designs by Tee LLC
subtitle: Brooklyn Social Worker designing positive t-shirts and apparel. Supporting homeless children and families in NYC.

title: Grace X Originals LLC
subtitle: Grace X Originals is a "Slow Fashion" Streetwear & Lifestyle Brand. We take our time to expertly hand-dye our textiles and apply high-end airbrush artistry to our designs with sustainable fashion practices foremost in mind.

title: glAze
subtitle: glAze represents those that don't believe it takes much to create an amazing look. We are the stealthy, the un-gawdy, enjoy pale hues and monochromatic splendor yet can switch it up and get really BOLD!

title: NCMPRBL
subtitle: NCMPRBL (pronounced: N-Com-Par-Bull) is a black doctor owned watch and fashion accessories brand. Our premium watches and accessories are designed with 316L stainless steel, water resistance, and levels of attention meant to exceed your expectations.

title: Taste by Dannie K
subtitle: Taste by Dannie K is a black-owned lingerie company dedicated to the empowerment of women of all shades and sizes. It is our mission to help women realize that they are powerful beyond measure & that they don't have to tone down their super power of sexy to be taken seriously.

title: BAH NICA
subtitle: Where the serene aquamarine seas meet the amber volcanic lava. Where resilience meets creative passion. In it's simplest form, it's truly the defining moment where elegance and excellence meet.

title: Jenks Fashionique
subtitle: We are for the fashion forward confident woman who is living her life defined by her passions. We strive to provide fashionable high quality merchandise to those who want to look their best. We sell a selective quantity of each item and rarely restock more than once so that you will not have to worry about anyone else saying, "Jenks" (jynx) because she is wearing the same thing as you! We offer boutique shopping from the comfort of your own home!

title: BLK & Proud Forever
subtitle: BLK & Proud Forever was started in 2019 for a family that was in need of some custom apparel that could display their Black pride. Our goal is to provide some great BLK&Proud gear that supports, celebrates and amplifies the dopeness in being Blackity Black Black 365.

title: YTPshop - African Clothing
subtitle: All YTPshop products are crafted by women in Nigeria and the fabrics are carefully sourced from West African markets. YTPshop products are made with high-quality material, cutting edge tailoring, vibrant colors, and are affordably priced.

title: The Weave Zone
subtitle: The Weave Zone has high-end and quality adult toys and hair, for prices that you can bare.

title: Shop Thoughtful
subtitle: thoughtful is a nonprofit that seeks to promote black businesses and create a one-stop-shop for consumers who want to vote with their wallets. thoughtful does not take any commissions off of the businesses it promotes, it is purely a hub designed to uplift and support established Black-owned businesses online.

title: Post 21
subtitle: Post 21 was created by a Mother-Daughter duo who wanted a comprehensive marketplace that focused on products from Black-owned businesses. They felt strongly that there’s no reason why these products are consistently being discovered when they should be household names. So, they said let’s create the place we want to shop.

title: Esusu
subtitle: Forbes Under 30 social entrepreneurs, Nigerian-born entrepreneur Wemimo and his business partner Goel co-founded Esusu in 2019. The mobile platform helps individuals mostly from marginalized communities save money, access capital and build credit.

title: Text a bot for book suggestions
subtitle: Twitter user @ecmoy created a bot that you can text for recommendations of books written by Black authors based on genre. It will also link you to a Black-owned bookstore that is selling the title. Text (409) 404-0403 to try it!

title: Coral Oral
subtitle: Not only are these toothbrushes more aesthetically pleasing, you differentiate each brush by its pattern and not by its color. Our company is proudly black owned and highlights oral health facts including a Black history fact that we all should know!

products.name: Medium 4-Pack
products.description: A full brush head and precision cut bristles to reach the tooth's total surface. Gently cleans and massages gums, tongue and teeth. Medium bristles sure not to cause any damage or pain!

products.name: Soft Single-Pack
products.description: A full brush head and precision cut bristles to reach the tooth's total surface. Gently cleans and massages gums, tongue and teeth. Soft bristles sure not to cause any damage or pain!

products.name: Medium Single-Pack
products.description: A full brush head and precision cut bristles to reach the tooth's total surface. Gently cleans and massages gums, tongue and teeth. Medium bristles sure not to cause any damage or pain!

title: The Honey Pot Company
subtitle: Stay clean, fresh, and balanced, even during your period with our natural menstrual products. Banish bacteria and cramps with herbal-infused, chemical-free sanitary pads and tampons that create a "cooling" effect that’s both protective and soothing.

products.name: Menstrual Cup
products.description: If tampons or pads aren't your "cup" of tea, reach for the Honey Pot Co Menstrual Cup: a convenient, sustainable alternative that's good for you and the earth.

products.name: Mommy-to-Be Wash
products.description: Use our feminine hygiene wash during pregnancy to balance your pH, fight odor-causing bacteria, and calm discomfort while gently cleansing your honeypot.

products.name: Soothing Body Balm
products.description: This body salve is infused with natural magnesium for menstrual cramps and 500 mg of broad-spectrum hemp distillate. This hemp and magnesium body balm does not contain THC.

title: Jungalow
subtitle: Black-owned home decor store selling furniture, bed and bath products, planters, and more.

products.name: Tigress Tangerine Rug by Justina Blakeney® X Loloi
products.description: Hooked of 100% wool pile, the Tigress Collection brings the wild to the home. Designed by Justina Blakeney by Loloi, the collection brings saturated colors and illustrative designs for a true conversation piece in any space.

products.name: Mary Jane Hook Pillow by Justina Blakeney
products.description: We love the bold contrasting colors of the teal leaf motif against the fresh peachy-orange. The square shape is easy to toss anywhere – a 'chill out chair', a cozy pillow pit on the floor... anywhere you imagine. Hint: This pillows makes for a rad gift for your mellow homies!

products.name: Berry Raffia Garland
products.description: Make your wall, mantle or holiday tree pop with this raffia wall garland! This colorful and unique garland will bring joy to any room. Style it with vintage wall baskets or wall hangings to create a vibrant gallery style wall.

title: PUR Home
subtitle: Changing the way you think about clean with laundry and cleaning products for your bathroom, kitchen, and beyond.

products.name: Dish Soap
products.description: PUR Home's All Natural Dish Soap Cuts through grease and dirt to leave all your dirty/greasy dishes clean, without drying out your hands. Made with both plant-based and biodegradable ingredients and scented with Pure Essential Oils. Safe to use around children and pets, and safe for our Planet.

products.name: Multi-Surface Cleaner
products.description: PUR Home's Multi-Surface Household Cleaner is a super cleaner for all of your surfaces, including your kitchen surfaces, base boards, refrigerator, bathroom surfaces and fixtures, inside your car. Safe enough for your little one's toys, crib and so much more.

products.name: Laundry Detergent
products.description: This Safe and Effective Liquid Laundry Detergent is perfect for those who are looking for a detergent that is sulfate-free and non-toxic. It does not contain a long list of harsh chemicals found in conventional brands.

title: Riot Swim
subtitle: Riot Swim is an online designer swimwear and beachwear brand, offering an exclusive collection of bikinis, one piece swimsuits, and more.

products.name: Echo One Piece- Kiwi
products.description: Minimal coverage front and back. Doubles as bodysuit. Body sculpting. Fitted at waist to flatter curves.

products.name: Pico Top-Chocolate
products.description: Full coverage top. Adjustable tie. Body sculpting. No Padding.

products.name: Riot Crop Tee-Black
products.description: Short-sleeve crop. Cotton tee. Round neck.

title: Bleu Jay's Gourmet Seasonings
subtitle: Bleu Jay's Gourmet Seasonings and More has been proudly providing high quality products and services since 2014. What differentiates us from other businesses is our ability to truly connect with our customers, and provide the exceptional, compassionate service they deserve. To learn more, simply browse through our site.

products.name: Jerk seasoning
products.description: Our Jerk seasoning is full of bold flavors that bring the flavors to your palette and keep you wanting more. Whether you're eating chicken, oxtails, shrimp, or potato wedges, you will enjoy every bite.

products.name: Apple Pie
products.description: These prices bring out the sweet flavors of an apple. It can be used on apple pies, cobblers, oatmeal topping and baked apples.

products.name: Greens (No Salt added)
products.description: A variety of flavors best used to add to your green vegetables. No Salt added for those who have health issues or diet restrictions.

title: Plum Good
subtitle: Plum Good locally produces, discriminately sources and proudly brings to market the highest quality culinary and restorative spices, herbs and tea blends available. Our mission is to help bring flavorful nutrition available to our customers.  We make All Natural rubs and blends, teas, jams and sauces.

products.name: Paprika Lime Blend
products.description: This SALT FREE blend of citrus, paprika, garlic, and lime gives color, zest, and mouth watering flavor to fish, chicken, and poultry.

products.name: Organic Chai Tea
products.description: Black Tea, Ginger, Cardamom, Cloves, Peppercorns Cinnamon

products.name: Sweet & Hot Chocolate Sauce
products.description: A culinary gourmet delight for cooks and foodies alike! Choice serrano and chocolate peppers, dark chocolate, balsamic vinegar, raw sugar, cardamom and water make a mouthwatering marinade, topping or accompaniment and make everything it comes into contact with delicious.

title: Red Bay Coffee
subtitle: Red Bay Coffee is at the forefront of what we believe is the fourth wave of coffee—a firm commitment to ensure coffee production is not only high quality and sustainable, but a vehicle for diversity, inclusion, social and economic restoration, entrepreneurship, and environmental sustainability. We are foodies, artists, activists, community folk, and innovators who love, love, love what we do.

products.name: East Fourteenth
products.description: Tanzanian Dark Roast - Blackberry, Dark Chocolate, Date  East Fourteenth is an homage to a past heritage and a link to history in the making. It is the story of Oakland’s wide-reaching cultures and creeds.

products.name: Coffee Mug - Africa's Gift (Black)
products.description: "Coffee Africa's Gift to the World" Coffee Mug - beautiful, stylish, black-on-black design with Red Bay Coffee logo - 12 ounces

products.name: Unisex Sweatshirt - Red Bay Spoon Logo - Gold
products.description: "Red Bay Spoon Logo" Crewneck Unisex Sweatshirt - gold with black print; back Red Bay Coffee logo; 80/20 Poly-Cotton Blend. Locally sourced and screen printed in Oakland, CA.

title: BLK & Bold
subtitle: BLK & Bold welcomes the obligation to equip young people with tools to live their best lives and overcome familiar unfortunate circumstances by turning a daily ritual, enjoying a cup of coffee & tea, into a means of giving back. BLK & Bold pledges 5% of its profits to initiatives aligned to sustaining youth programming, enhancing workforce development, and eradicating youth homelessness.

products.name: La Guadalupe, Honduras - Single Origin (Direct Trade), Light Roast
products.description: As these beans are directly sourced from Finca La Guadalupe, this single origin will satisfy your desire for a creamy bodied light roast. With undertones of caramel and honey, this will become your everyday coffee.

products.name: Jasmine Loose Leaf Green Tea
products.description: Satisfy both smell and taste with this Jasmine Tea! Lightly smooth & sweet, it contains green tea leaves absorbed with fragrance from jasmine petals. This produces a cup that is very sensual with floral aromatics

products.name: BLK & Bold Logo Dad Hats
products.description: 2020 BLK & Bold Logo Dad Hat. Black/White/Yellow

title: The Nile List
subtitle: Nile is a digital community that connects consumers with Black-owned brands online. Think of Nile as your one-stop-shop for Black brands. All you have to do is think of what you want to buy online and we will show you somebody Black who makes that!
